Annotation.note:
The paper [BIB/Wang_95b] gives an introduction to characteristic series and a detailed description of the implementation of the author's Maple package charseries: weak basic sets, modified pseudo remainder, dividing out constraint factors, variable order heuristics, examples and benchmarks.
It discusses the following examples:
Wang-89 as Problem 1 Butcher as Problem 2 Wang-92e as Problem 3 Bronstein-86 as Problem 4
